cosinnus.loaders package¶

cosinnus.loaders.eggs module¶

class cosinnus.loaders.eggs.EggOrigin(app_name, pkg_name, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: Origin

class cosinnus.loaders.eggs.Loader(engine)¶

Bases: Loader

get_contents(origin)¶
get_template_sources(template_name)¶

An iterator that yields possible matching template paths for a template name.

load_template_source(template_name, template_dirs=None)¶

Loads templates from Python eggs via pkg_resource.resource_string.

For every installed app, it tries to get the resource (app, template_name).
